Description:
JB100222/07-33 - 312284493 - You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of machinery, namely the rotating abrasive wheel on your Wolf bench grinding machine whilst in operation, posing a risk of entanglement and impact injuries in the event of a wheel burst.

JB090222/06-33 - 312284568 - You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of machinery, namely the rotating chuck on your Archdale Weston 1009 pillar drill whilst in operation, giving rise to the risk of injury from entanglement.

JB020222/02-33 - 312284598 - You have failed to make and give effect to such arrangements as are appropriate having regard to the nature of your activities for the effective planning, organisation, control, monitoring and review of the preventative and protective measures required for the risks to your employees from the use of metalworking fluid.

JB040222/04-33 - 312284619 - You have failed to provide suitable health surveillance for employees who are, or are liable to be, exposed to a substance hazardous to health, namely metalworking fluid which can cause occupational dermatitis and lung disease.

JB070222/05-33 - 312284645 - You have failed to make and give effect to such arrangements as are appropriate having regard to the nature of your activities for the effective planning, organisation, control, monitoring and review of the preventative and protective measures required for the risks to your employees from the use of your metalworking machinery, such as your pillar drills and grinding machines.

JB020222/01-33 - 312284660 - You have failed to ensure that your Still R50-10 forklift truck (Serial number 50320311), which is lifting equipment exposed to conditions causing deterioration liable to result in dangerous situations, has been thoroughly examined by a suitably competent person within the specified time of 12 months.

JB030222/03-33 - 312284683 - You have failed to ensure that your pressure system, namely the Kaeser Kompressoren (Serial number 1358), is examined by a suitably competent person in accordance with a written scheme of examination.
